apiCopilotConfig.welcomeMessage:
Welcome to the FDX Developer Portal!

Explore the following prompts and harness the power of the FDX API with API Copilot's assistance!

 - `Can you show me all the bank accounts linked to my profile?` 
 - `I want to see details for one of my accounts. How do I do that?` 
 - `How do I check recent transactions for my bank account?` 
 - `Can I view a specific transaction and its full details?` 
 - `What personal or party info is associated with my account?`
